Title: TUI - a Text User Interface Windows Library for .net
Description: TUI is a Control library which provides Elements for creating a Windows-Based-User-Interface on System.Console. It contains Controls like Windows, Textboxes, Comboboxes and ListViews. It is completely Object-Orientated, so that you can easily derive your own Custom-Controls.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
TUI is a Control library which provides Elements for creating a Windows-Based-User-Interface on System.Console. It contains Controls like Windows, Textboxes, Comboboxes and ListViews. It is completely Object-Orientated, so that you can easily derive your own Custom-Controls.
